properties.name: Gold Coast
properties.popupContent: This is where my plane landed when i came in Australia

properties.name: Southbank
properties.popupContent: We already took a flatmate so we went directly to the house, based in Gold Coast, in Southbank to be precise

properties.name: Tully Memorial Park
properties.popupContent: We spend our first camping night in this freecamp. We slept in our car for the first time and that was so great ! I was so excited to start our adventure

properties.name: Caboolture Showgrounds
properties.popupContent: This is where the Rockies play!

properties.name: Stradbroke Island
properties.popupContent: We spent few days on Stradbroke Island. We had the chance to see some kangaroos and to (caresser) them

properties.name: Clifton
properties.popupContent: After few days that we take to find a new job we went to Clifton, a little city where we found a picking job at 15 - 20 min from here. Our work was to pick some millet (a type of cereal) in a little family farm. The lady was so kind with us. She was preparing a breakfast everyday for us with some fresh milk and fresh eggs from their hen

properties.name: Rabbits Eat Lettuce Festival
properties.popupContent: With my friends we already took a ticket for this festival when we still were at the flatmate and we were really excited to discover the ambiance of the festival, the happiness and costumes of every people and of course the satges and their sets, ready to give us some amazing music

properties.name: Emerald
properties.popupContent: Then we spent few days to recover after that huge party. We traveled a bit while trying to get a job and we saw that farmers were looking for workers in Emerald for the grape harvest so we went to Emerald and started to work in the grapes. That was really cool to work with all my friends in a good ambiance with music sometimes but we had to be better and faster to earn more money.

properties.name: Byron bay
properties.popupContent: After than we having worked to get enough money to continue our trip we went to Byron Bay, a beautiful city at the far-northeastern corner of the country. The landscapes were so gorgeous especially from the lighthouse.

properties.name: Gayndah
properties.popupContent: We came in Gayndah to work in the oranges so for two days we were looking for a job in the city. We found one and we started the same day but after one hour i broke my right ankle. What a nice worker i am :') So i stayed in the camping while doing nothing every day for one month, that was really annoying. But i met lot of nice people so that was also cool

properties.name: Orin-Aya Festival
properties.popupContent: After that my friend finished his work, we went to festival in the north of the country with some people that we met in Gayndah. The festival was smaller than the Rabbits Eat Lettuce but people were more friendly and happy. We were like a big family that was so cool. I spent all the festival with chair cause of my crutches but i can say that i enjoyed it a lot. We met two people who were so nice that we decided to continue our trip with them

properties.name: North visit - Daintree Forest
properties.popupContent: So we travelled with our new friends in the North of the Queensland (a state) for few days to visit it. That was really impressive, the forest was huge and the temperature was wet. We had lot of points of view on the road so we could stop a bit and admire the landscape

properties.name: Airlie Beach
properties.popupContent: We decided to stop our cars in Airlie Beach, first cause the point of view is amazing around there with the Great Barrier Reef and the color of the sea is so gorgeous and second, cause we did a place tour over the Great Barrier Reef and that was unbelievable

properties.name: Rockhampton
properties.popupContent: After that we splitted and my friend and i decided that i had to stay in a backpack in city cause of my broken ankle. I had to take rest to heal my leg and to start the rehabilitation. So i was alone in a backpack for approximately 3 months. That was boring sometimes but it it allowed me to improve my english skills with other customers. Then an other friend came from France to join me. We spent 2 weeks before in the same backpack before to go join my other friend.
